original_text:
For he flatters himself in his own eyes
    that his iniquity cannot be found out and hated.
korean_text: 그가 스스로 자랑하기를 자기의 죄악은 드러나지 아니하고 미워함을 받지도 아니하리라 함이로다

sentences.original_text: For he flatters himself in his own eyes
that his iniquity cannot be found out and hated.
sentences.korean_translation: 자기의 불의가 드러나지도 미움받지도 않을 것이라 생각합니다.
